verses.roman:
prabhure śānta kari' ānila nija ghare
paḍuyā palāyā gela paḍuyā-sabhāre

synonyms: prabhure—the Lord; śānta kari'-pacifying; ānila—brought; nija—His own; ghare—to the house; paḍuyā—the student; palāyā—running away; gela—went; paḍuyā—of students; sabhāre—to the assembly.
translation: The devotees pacified the Lord and brought Him home, and the student ran away to an assembly of other students.
